title: Alumni Panel: How to be a Job-Seeker in a Tough Economy (Virtual Webinar) | Engineering Career Center | University of Illinois at Chicago

Please welcome UIC Engineering Alumni back (virtually) to campus! Alumni who graduated around the Great Recession of 2009 will share stories of their successes and challenges while they were searching for a job during a very tough economic climate, similar to what they experienced when they graduated in 2009/2010.  This webinar is intended for students/recent alumni who are seeking a full-time job, although all students may find it useful.  ALL UIC students and alumni are welcome to attend.    NOTE: This is part of a webinar series presented by the Engineering Career Center! Stay tuned for more career development webinars.    Contact  Jonna McHugh  312-413-3873  jonnac@uic.edu     Date posted  May 6, 2020    Date updated  May 6, 2020
